trans-unit.source: Represents the delegate for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs"></xref> event.

The WebPartVerbsEventHandler class is used to specify the methods that are invoked in response to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event, which occurs when the Web Parts verbs are created for a zone that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: WebPartVerbsEventHandler 类用于指定以响应<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>事件，就会出现此区域，派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>为创建 Web 部件谓词时</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>调用的方法

trans-unit.source: Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件谓词表示用户可在 Web 部件页，例如最小化、 关闭或还原控件; 的用户界面 (UI) 中执行的操作将控件添加到页;或取消操作。

trans-unit.source: Verbs can appear in both the header and footer areas of a zone, and there are both standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom verbs that can be added by developers.
trans-unit.target: 谓词可以出现在页眉和页脚区域的区域，并且没有提供的 Web 部件控件集，标准谓词和自定义可以由开发人员添加的谓词。

trans-unit.source: A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 谓词由在 UI 中的可单击的对象，你可以将设置为显示为超链接、 图像或按钮，通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone provides a standard set of verbs that get rendered in a Web Parts control's verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>区域提供一组标准的 Web 部件控件的谓词菜单中呈现的谓词。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: A custom Web Parts zone, or a Web Parts control inside a Web Parts zone, can add additional verbs to the menu.
trans-unit.target: 自定义 Web 部件区域中或在 Web 部件区域中，Web 部件控件可以向菜单添加其他谓词。

trans-unit.source: A control in a Web Parts zone can add verbs to the control's verbs menu by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class and overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件区域中的控件可以通过继承向控件的谓词菜单添加谓词<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基类的重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the control does not inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class, you can add a new verb by implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface, and then overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件不是继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基类，可以通过实现来添加新谓词<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>接口，以及然后重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method allows derived classes to override the event without attaching a delegate to it.
trans-unit.target: 受保护的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法允许派生类重写事件而不必附加委托到它。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A derived class must always call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method of the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类必须始终调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>方法的基类以确保，注册的委托对事件进行接收。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>
